title: Unwatchable
review: I had to turn it off after the first 15 minutes. Story line all over the place and unrealistic portrayal of the "robbery"!

title: A Rare beauty
review:
First I thought all the movie crew and director was on drugs when making this movie.

But it turns out this is a genius movie.

A must watch!

title: Awesome
review: Was a very well put together indie film, the cast did a wonderful job and as well as the directors and the writers, I would say this is a must see indie film.
